features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增三方应用通话录音功能，提升系统性能和部分场景功耗体验，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增微信、QQ 三方应用通话录音功能。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 第三方应用通话录音。
• 分屏场景下，支持按应用进行选择截屏。 • 优化系统性能，让您的手机运行更流畅。 • 提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定。
• 优化部分场景功耗体验。
• 合入安卓 2025 年 2 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/2
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update enables call recording in some third-party apps and improves the system performance. It also reduces the power consumption in some scenarios and incorporates a security patch. Update to enjoy the new features and improvements.
• Call recording is available in third-party apps like WeChat and QQ. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > App call recording.

• You can take screenshots of individual apps in split-screen mode. • Optimizes the system performance to make your device run more smoothly. • Improves the system stability to make your device run more stably.
• Reduces the power consumption in some scenarios.

• Android security patch (Feb 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/2

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Discover more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any issues during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
